00027 #ifndef MSQ_VERTEX_PATCHES_CPP
00028 #define MSQ_VERTEX_PATCHES_CPP
00029 
00035 #include "VertexPatches.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00037 #include "MeshInterface.hpp"
00038 #include "MsqVertex.hpp"
00039 
00040 #include <algorithm>
00041 
00042 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00043 
00044 VertexPatches::~VertexPatches()
00045 {}
00046 
00047 void VertexPatches::get_patch_handles( std::vector<PatchHandle>& patch_handles_out,
00048                                        MsqError& err )
00049 {
00050     // get all vertex handles
00051   get_mesh()->get_all_vertices( patch_handles_out, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00052   if (patch_handles_out.empty())
00053     return;
00054   
00055   if (free_vertices_only()) {
00056       // get fixed flags for vertices
00057     std::vector<unsigned char> flags(patch_handles_out.size());
00058     get_mesh()->vertices_get_byte( arrptr(patch_handles_out),
00059                                    arrptr(flags),
00060                                    patch_handles_out.size(),
00061                                    err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00062     
00063       // remove fixed  and slaved vertices from list
00064     size_t write = 0;
00065     for (size_t read = 0; read < patch_handles_out.size(); ++read) 
00066       if (!(flags[read] & (MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED|MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT)))
00067         patch_handles_out[write++] = patch_handles_out[read];
00068     patch_handles_out.resize(write);
00069   }
00070 }
00071 
00072 void VertexPatches::get_patch( PatchHandle patch_handle,
00073                                std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& elem_handles_out,
00074                                std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>& free_vertices_out,
00075                                MsqError& err )
00076 {
00077   free_vertices_out.clear();
00078   elem_handles_out.clear();
00079     
00080   if (free_vertices_only()) { // check if vertex is culled
00081     unsigned char byte;
00082     get_mesh()->vertices_get_byte( &patch_handle, &byte, 1, err );
00083     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || (byte & MsqVertex::MSQ_CULLED))
00084       return;
00085   }
00086     
00087   free_vertices_out.push_back( patch_handle );
00088   if (!numLayers)  // if no layers of elements, then done.
00089     return;
00090     
00091     // get elements adjacent to free vertex
00092   get_mesh()->vertices_get_attached_elements( &patch_handle, 
00093                                               1,
00094                                               elem_handles_out, 
00095                                               junk, err );
00096   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00097     return;
00098   
00099   unsigned remaining = numLayers;
00100   while (--remaining) { // loop if more than one layer of elements
00101     if (elem_handles_out.empty()) 
00102       break;  
00103 
00104       // Get vertices adjacent to elements
00105     free_vertices_out.clear();
00106     get_mesh()->elements_get_attached_vertices( arrptr(elem_handles_out),
00107                                                 elem_handles_out.size(),
00108                                                 free_vertices_out,
00109                                                 junk, err );
00110     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) break;
00111     
00112       // remove duplicates from vertex list
00113     std::sort( free_vertices_out.begin(), free_vertices_out.end() );
00114     free_vertices_out.erase( 
00115         std::unique( free_vertices_out.begin(), free_vertices_out.end() ),
00116         free_vertices_out.end() );
00117   
00118       // Get elements adjacent to vertices
00119     elem_handles_out.clear();
00120     get_mesh()->vertices_get_attached_elements( arrptr(free_vertices_out), 
00121                                                 free_vertices_out.size(),
00122                                                 elem_handles_out, 
00123                                                 junk, err );
00124     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) break;
00125 
00126       // Remove duplicates from element list
00127     std::sort( elem_handles_out.begin(), elem_handles_out.end() );
00128     elem_handles_out.erase( 
00129         std::unique( elem_handles_out.begin(), elem_handles_out.end() ),
00130         elem_handles_out.end() );
00131   }
00132 }
